markdown:
<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 4"
    pfs="Standard"
>
[Thousand Faces](/Feats.aspx?ID=324) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Druid" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=52" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

**Source** [Core Rulebook](/Sources.aspx?ID=1) pg. 135 <sup>4.0</sup>

**Prerequisites**
[Wild Shape](/Feats.aspx?ID=316)

</column>

---

Your form is as mutable as the weather, changing to meet your whim. You add the forms listed in [_humanoid form_](/Spells.aspx?ID=153) to your [_wild shape_](/Spells.aspx?ID=481) list.
name: Thousand Faces
